2021.title: Avionics Intern @ SpaceX
2021.blurb: I'm working at SpaceX this summer! I am on the Starship Avionics team, developing signal processing systems to gather accurate data. Hopefully this will help get Starship to the Moon and Mars!

2021.title: CUTC Technology Lead
2021.blurb: As a part of the Canadian Undergraduate Technology Conference, my team provides the infrastructure to allow the conference to function. We are currently focusing on registration, the website, and the blog.

2021.title: FPGA AI Processor
2021.blurb: I designed and implemented a circuit that performance neural network inferences. This project was a dive into Verilog and AI efficiency.

2020.title: Firmware Security @ AMD
2020.blurb: I developed communication systems inside their new APUs while maintaining security and efficiency. Although is was completely remote, I'm still very thankful because I got to work with incredibly smart people.

2020.title: Passion Finding App
2020.blurb: I made this app to help people explore concepts and ideas in a non-linear way. Users can explore a 2D map of interests and see how they see themselves in it. This took lots of data analysis, app design, and development!

2020.title: AI Acceleration Engineering @ Untether AI
2020.blurb: My first tech job ever! I worked in Toronto for both the Hardware and Software teams; I helped build their SoC verification suite and the drivers that transfered data to and from their chip!

2019.title: Started University at Waterloo!
2019.blurb: I began my first term in September! I met amazing people, played Varsity Ultimate Frisbee, and lived on my own for the first real time.

2019.title: Camp Counselour
2019.blurb: I worked at Camp Couchiching after being a camper there for 10 years. I got to spend lots of time with some really amazing kids.

2019.title: Shad at UCalgary
2019.blurb: In July I went to Calgary and worked with an amazing group, developing a product focused on environmental sustainability. I got to play a lot of Ultimate Frisbee, visit some tourist destinations, and camp! I even got to be the Valedictorian :)

2019.title: Student Theatre Festival
2019.blurb: I organized and hosted a student-run threatre festival with plays, a magician, musical acts, and improv. I have also wrote a play and directed, acted, and ran audio for the entire show. This is my favourite memory from highschool.

2019.title: Four bit Computer
2019.blurb: I spent six months breadboarding, designing, and building a fully programmable four bit computer - it was the most intense hardware project I've built. The final product is a printed circuit board with a 3D-printed case a laser-cut acryllic cover.
